A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Not a good movie\, just a cheap way to farm money from the fans. I could point all the reasons why i didnt liked this movie for sure\, but i think many here already pointed pretty much every bad or cringe moment this movie had that i dont think i have anything to add up\, all i can say is: Visually its a beautiful movie\, but its also a empty shell of what SW stands for and meant for all these old-school fans
